decks.notes: The deck aims to maintain control of the board by utilizing efficient removal spells and countermagic, while also putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf. It also focuses on disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Daze to interfere with the opponent's game plan. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and to interact with the opponent's lands through Wasteland. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and Brazen Borrower offers additional tempo plays. The deck seeks to win through a combination of creature beats and disrupting the opponent's plans.

This deck revolves around the powerful combo of Doomsday, using cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Teferi, Time Raveler to set up for a game-winning play with Thassa's Oracle. The deck also includes various cantrips and counterspells to find the pieces needed for the combo and protect it from disruption. The key strategy is to carefully plan out your sequence of plays and resources to ensure a successful Doomsday resolution and victory.

The deck focuses on assembling the Dark Depths combo, using cards like Thespian's Stage and Crop Rotation to quickly create 20/20 Marit Lage tokens. It also includes key pieces like Knight of the Reliquary and Elvish Reclaimer to search for land cards and help assemble the combo. Protection is provided by cards like Swords to Plowshares and Green Sun's Zenith to deal with threats, while cards like Once Upon a Time and Mox Diamond help with consistency and ramp. The deck aims to win the game quickly by creating a powerful board presence with the Dark Depths combo.

This Lands Control deck focuses on utilizing lands as a resource to control the game. It utilizes cards like Crop Rotation, Life from the Loam, and Thespian's Stage to manipulate its land base for maximum value. The deck also includes key lands like Dark Depths and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale to disrupt the opponent's strategy. By combining land interaction with control elements like Mox Diamond and Exploration, this deck aims to outmaneuver and outlast the opponent through resource management and strategic plays.
